entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 09:08 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 09:08 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
